CustomField.description: When ticked, this indicates there is an AusNet owned meter and reconfig will be required. It is ticked if 'Meter Install Type Code' on DER Application is RRIM, MRIM, or BASIC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When ticked, this indicates there is an AusNet owned meter and reconfig will be required. It is ticked if 'Meter Install Type Code' on DER Application is RRIM, MRIM, or BASIC.
CustomField.label: AusNet Owned Meter
